article: One morning, my son, Chilly, found a carpenterworm unexpectedly and put it in a jar. Each day he couldn't  _  to visit the little guest. Few weeks later we discovered it  _  in a cocoon . The next day, I  _  Chilly it was time to set it free. He took it  _  and opened the jar. It circled the yard twice, came back, and  _  on Chilly's arm. He picked it up and threw it in the air. The next day he attempted to set it free again, and after a few repetitions the moth finally  flew off  into the grass. Like a  _  , I believe the moth was afraid to  _  what it was comfortable with. It wanted to stay with something  _  , scared to move on and experience something unknown. I was once that little moth.
